EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Steve Walsh (1386100730.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Steve Walsh (1386100730.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Steve, Sure do - when appropriate, please edit the email below (or a portion of the email’ s language) and send to your client contact, making sure to CC me on the email as well. This information will introduce MBO Partners, provide our payment information and other documents, and instruct them to complete the “Independent Consultant Statement of Work” so that we capture your relevant project information. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Dear CLIENT, Thank you for the opportunity to provide support on the upcoming/specific effort. At this point in the process, I would like to introduce you to Sara Conde, my contact at MBO Partners, Inc. MBO’s service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses that want to engage smoothly and easily with their clients. MBO takes care of my back-office administrative support, including invoicing, collecting payments, withholding taxes, insurance coverage, and much more, so that I can stay focused on providing you with the best possible service. For more information, please refer to MBO’s one-page document <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how they work with consultants and their clients. <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFVPuk5iy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>As a function of this service, MBO Partners will be invoicing for and accepting payments on my behalf. To get everything fully initiated, please fill out and return the below form as soon as possible: - Independent Consultant Statement of Work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Independent_Consultant_Statement_of_Work.pdf>– Please complete, sign, and return Additionally, the following links provide important information on MBO that you will find useful: - MBO Payment Information <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Wire_and_Payment_Information.pdf> - W-9 for MBO Partners <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_W-9.pdf> - Certificate of Liability Insurance <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Sample_COI.pdf> If you have any questions about MBO Partners you can reach out directly to Sara Conde (copied above) at 703-793-6028 or via email at sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Consultant NAME __________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Stephen Walsh [mailto:swalsh8@verizon.net] Sent: Tuesday, December 03, 2013 1:44 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Steve Walsh Sara, Do we have a standard blurb for describing the MBO relationship with consultants and their customers? I am approaching small companies which may not have a relationship with MBO. I need something to help me explain what they need to do to contract my services wising MBO. Thanks, Steve Stephen Walsh swalsh8@verizon.net <mailto:swalsh8@verizon.net> (757) 622-7109 (h) (757) 646-5471 (c) On Nov 11, 2013, at 5:35 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Steve, Good to hear from you. Thanks so much for the update – I really appreciate it. The only example statement of work I have is this template <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRuX1ncI81gd3f%2D3IPVKgu%5FxmI6Y3aPmSABYVXYBlxlNVEfSqaI9Lp6dFPmCZYjHcgYTgVph4Q%5FEh%5FtI45piPj3YOoumQvXLmCFscGUhUXVPPRKoLsgj0KbkWeCqG9k7GcNQH2Xss>, is this the one you were using. I got it from this page <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyAPni198710x7fPjcdUb6gddUU54zcOedCU0TAZVg1AVWHa2ccoRF6vBTD0S8THb8j6%5FJeoFaeLp0kdJi8LiglXcKuNbPllPPHEILTmUhcA%2DNevIhijmqJJUuTw%2DG7n6eOIw3ozwHjuBWzqeKVom%2D2HKFz33T2gfLZnNuvdirwAuqB5FeifgvlUAw%2DgkfRdmjsRjS6YoQuj8SwMtejBBa8bkhBIw7xA%2C%2C> on our Independents Guide. Please let me know if you need anything else. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/0xkILICQIUJaukly7tyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2DBvq538Qq5lxxebGdIHTOo%2DlbP5MXX9CLNzBVQbJymRVoMLeDd4h06NpzIUCmSmLGuJiPPaBbWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyVvrtxvAq1kMjIPT6GWrVgvBQOagLcN%2DsRFAyAMl48CYPDOudSJJv1N9cH1PrYQPG1fP3eqZ4RKdq9fRG1qmp7WdA%2DfnHwXg%2C> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/1gwVMM7QNENcs0Jk%2Df2VbKTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%5FTp34As3E57YP7ONAz%5FmtxWDpM%5FOvvDAg0eF5UnzQdMJfSad90S4sB8IHu4ezraupjPWb8LI5ZghdhR1f%2Dz02gxuPKsuF3YGxY3eEg5NiuIQokVlyTOBbcKXg%2Dy%5FT6SEcJwuA%2C%2C> to MBO Partners! From: Stephen Walsh [mailto:swalsh8@verizon.net <http://verizon.net>] Sent: Monday, November 11, 2013 3:09 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Steve Walsh Sara, Still working it. I was expecting a Navy contact to break my way last week, working through TQI. The government shutdown sentNavy contracting into a tizzy; their still working out of it. Hoping for some good news before Thanksgiving. The other line of advance leads back to the site I was cut from in August. I had lunch with my old government lead recently, and he is desperate to get me back on task for two major projects. And he understands the economics of bringing me back in as an independent. Along these lines do you have any statements of work you can share with me? I have ben using the template on the MBO site, but some real examples would be helpful. I want to be able to move quickly with a SOW when the window opens. Thanks, Steve Stephen Walsh swalsh8@verizon.net <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/0xkILICQIUJOtEtl46S5NKz%5Fli%5FPdNamvqgiBPzy7dsx0hUsatnuE3vlq9J0JqsnU9vbUyADSolR6ltOEeihbq9u0PRJGRiLYAKq0ozPRLt7Yq1a6eZI%5FqSQ3yVWjpjRtg%2C%2C> (757) 622-7109 (h) (757) 646-5471 (c) On Nov 9, 2013, at 4:47 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/0xkILICQIUJaukly7tyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2DBvq538Qq5lxxebGdIHTOo%2DlbP5MXX9CLNzBVQbJymRVoMLeDd4h06NpzIUCmSmLGuJiPPaBbWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C>> wrote:
Hello Steve, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here:http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/1gwVMM7QNF1Qu0w45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRqG%2DiuEO9B0sJ7yfaBG%2DvIMBS54BfLnPXg8bB691zwcFSPigXat68NZcLnuLTQ3NxfP4fNRXQZ4kysppy7qK9koEvs%5Fbq2T1XB0jVVpaURWEQIoHrTzrBZdmDCfCqV8%2C>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/0xkILICQIUJaukly7tyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2DBvq538Qq5lxxebGdIHTOo%2DlbP5MXX9CLNzBVQbJymRVoMLeDd4h06NpzIUCmSmLGuJiPPaBbWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80xtZFvOdJKBW%5F%2DdUEU68FjX6lOfPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EkdrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6chmM4FXbNtcOqA0cqIkpwbyILeON8V7x2XPvvhuUFUVS0PSCxGi7WLZNqocvpWx3xGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGnlHHGDJqy6cSF%5Fwwa2rh8iGBg2IQUJO%2DMqnyWCiyl8ZOhcQX3p3m9l/1gwVMM7QNF1Qu0w45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRqG%2DiuEO9B0sJ7yfaBG%2DvYMBS54BfLnPXg8bB691zwcFSPigXat68NZcLnuLTQ3NxfP4fNRXQZ4kysppy7qK9koEvs%5Fbq2T1XB0jVVpaURWEQIoHrTzrBZdmDCfCqV8%2C>
